title: Losing LP when you get 2 afks ??????
body: You gotta be kidding me you gotta do something about this ranked shit riot like its straight bullshit. Like__ man according to your ranked system i need to be able to carry 3v5 outta bronze ??????? seriously ???? im ranting idc who down votes this, this is a serious issue they need to stop making new champions and focus on the real problems, ill be submitting a ticket to support concerning this issue im sick and tired of bronze.

replies.body: Bronze is easy man, take an op champ, get good at them, go 20 and 0 every game. That's what I did

dude it is not that easy at all i really do not wanna see these comments if i ever do get out ill make a post about just how hard it really is because it is hard i play matches everyday and i try my BEST to win , securing objectives etc i swear to god it is not me this ranked shit is just messed up. i dont care

it IS that easy. Bronze players are terrible. Think like a baddie and identify their weaknesses (laning, teamwork). Get a champion that can function well without relying on a team (jungle bruisers, nasus, assassins with good escapes like LB, ahri, ekko, ect..). Roam, get fed, ward, try to carry. Your job is to become unstoppable, not babysit whoever is feeding.

AFKs, feeders, awe-inspiringly bad players, ect are incredibly annoying but no disadvantage to you - the other team gets them more often then yours does (assuming you are not one of them yourself, right?)

It really is that easy, there's a difference between knowing a champ and mastering them. If you can even come close to mastering an easy or overpowered champ it becomes extremely easy to win games over and over. Don't feel ashamed about playing Darius every game because, this just in, a lot of people have done it with others like yi and xin when they were broken.

In you last 20 Games you bought a total 4 Pinks.  
6 Games as ADC went 40 + mins and you had the same ward instead try to get this ward at level 9 or whenever you get the bot lane tower {{item:3462}} 
Playing as jungle try to get {{item:3341}}  on your first back with also {{item:2043}}.  Lay the pink  A. in the bush that is next to blue buff closest to the river on the side next to dragon,  or in the bush at the far edge below the enemy red buff.  
  Hope this helps some 
  Have a Good One !
You also win LP when the enemy has 2 afks.
